children.string: [Hey, John MacArthur. You have a Culture. It’s Called White (Christian) Patriarchy.](https://kristindumez.com/resources/hey-john-macarthur-you-have-a-culture-its-called-white-christian-patriarchy/)

Excerpt:: So I imagine you’ve been caught by surprise at the popularity/notoriety of that little audio clip released last week. I mean, it wasn’t as though you weren’t expressing something you haven’t said, in one form or another, for decades now.
